mapper.select: SELECT m.*,le.plant_levl_no,le.levl_img ,p.plant_no FROM my_plant m , plant_levl le , plant p WHERE m.plant_no = le.plant_no AND m.plant_no = p.plant_no AND nickname = #{nickname} AND m.my_plant_exp between le.plant_min_exp and le.plant_max_exp AND m.my_plant_state = 'Y' LIMIT 1;

SELECT m.my_plant_no, m.nickname, m.plant_no, m.my_plant_state, MAX(m.my_plant_exp) AS my_plant_exp, MIN(m.plant_start_date) AS plant_start_date, MAX(m.plant_end_date) AS plant_end_date, m.my_plant_name, GROUP_CONCAT(le.plant_levl_no) AS plant_levl_no_list FROM my_plant m , plant_levl le WHERE m.plant_no = le.plant_no AND m.nickname = #{nickname}
AND m.my_plant_state = 'Y'
AND m.my_plant_state = 'N'
GROUP BY m.my_plant_no, m.nickname, m.plant_no, m.my_plant_state, m.my_plant_name
ORDER BY MAX(m.plant_end_date) DESC
ORDER BY MAX(m.plant_end_date) ASC
ORDER BY SUM(m.my_plant_exp) DESC
ORDER BY SUM(m.my_plant_exp) ASC
ORDER BY m.my_plant_no DESC

SELECT m.my_plant_no, m.nickname, m.plant_no, m.my_plant_state, m.my_plant_exp, m.plant_start_date, m.plant_end_date, m.my_plant_name, le.plant_levl_no FROM my_plant m , plant_levl le WHERE m.plant_no = le.plant_no AND m.nickname = #{nickname} AND m.my_plant_state = 'N' AND my_plant_no = #{myPlantNo} AND m.my_plant_exp > le.plant_min_exp
